name: IHE-EUROPE
goal:
Non profit organization dedicated to interoperability in Health Information Technology. IHE-Europe gathers a large range of stakeholders to advance the share exchange of patient information.
IHE-Europe engages clinicians, health authorities, industry and users to improve Healthcare interoperability by helping stakeholders to adopt, promote and implement IHE profiles. IHE develops tools and services for testing interoperability between IT systems.
interests: Education, Enterprise, External Relations, Information Society, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
- Identification of IHE profiles in accordance the with Article 13 and Annex II (based on the WTO standardisation principles) of Regulation (EU) No. 1025 /2012 (Validation in July 2015)
- The Refined Health European Interoperability Framework (reEIF) endorsed by the Health Network
- Digital agenda (DAE) and DSM
- CEF: Connecting Facility for Europe
